about_the_game:
COMMAND // CALL-IN // DESTROY!

Fight alongside animal allies, defeat robot foes, and call-in powerful airstrikes in this action-packed demo to Foxtale: a single player, action-adventure, open world playground!

Tested to fully work with an Xbox Controller!
detailed_description:
COMMAND // CALL-IN // DESTROY!

Fight alongside animal allies, defeat robot foes, and call-in powerful airstrikes in this action-packed demo to Foxtale: a single player, action-adventure, open world playground!

Tested to fully work with an Xbox Controller!
name: Foxtale Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High Graphics Preset, Maximum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4060
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Developed on this hardware

short_description: Fight alongside animal allies, defeat robot foes, and call-in powerful airstrikes in this action-packed demo to Foxtale: a single player, action-adventure, open world playground!
